article_text: The Department of Veterans Affairs’ home-purchase financing program is now at record levels. New loans to buy houses have more than doubled since 2007.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Kenneth Harney, real estate, veterans, mortgage
article_metadata.title: For veterans, a housing boom | Miami Herald
article_metadata.keywords: Kenneth Harney, real estate, veterans, mortgage

article_summary:
The Department of Veterans Affairs’ home-purchase financing program is now at record levels.
New loans to buy houses have more than doubled since 2007.
